ViewObject.Name: VwDatDokladsubkonvazbydenikView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: /* select den.NL_PORADILIST, den.NL_RADEK, sum(den.ND_CASTKA * decode(den.NL_PORADILIST,5,db_jt.kurzy.f_getMenaAvgKurs(?,?,d.S_MENA,?),db_jt.kurzy.f_getMenaKurs(?,?,d.S_MENA,?)) ) nd_castka from db_jt.KP_DAT_DOKLADSUBKONVAZBYDENIK den, db_jt.KP_DAT_DOKLAD d where den.ID_DOKLAD = ? and den.ID_DOKLAD = d.ID and den.ID_KTGUCETNISPOLECNOSTFROM = ? group by den.NL_PORADILIST, den.NL_RADEK */ select den.NL_RADEK, sum(den.ND_CASTKA * decode(den.NL_PORADILIST,5,db_jt.kurzy.f_getMenaAvgKurs(?,?,d.S_MENA,?),db_jt.kurzy.f_getMenaKurs(?,?,d.S_MENA,?)) ) nd_castka, den.ID_KTGUCETNISPOLECNOSTTO from db_jt.KP_DAT_DOKLADSUBKONVAZBYDENIK den, db_jt.KP_DAT_DOKLAD d where den.ID_DOKLAD = d.ID and den.ID_KTGUCETNISPOLECNOSTFROM = ? and den.NL_PORADILIST = ? and den.ID_DOKLAD = ? and den.C_TYP = 'V' group by den.NL_RADEK, den.ID_KTGUCETNISPOLECNOSTTO
